recipe.title: Homemade Grenadine
ingredients: 6 ounces unsweetened pomegranate juice, such as Elite Naturel (www.organicjuiceusa.com)
instructions: Bring juice to simmer over medium heat and cook until reduced by half, about 7 minutes. Reduce heat and add sugar, stirring constantly until dissolved, about 2 minutes. Let cool, cover, and refrigerate syrup until cold, about 30 minutes. (Can be made 1 week ahead. Keep chilled.)
